name: state-router-example
description: Examples of abstract-state-router usage with various templating/rendering libraries

scripts.build: browserify -t brfs implementations/ractive/index.js -o implementations/ractive/bundle.js && browserify -t riotify implementations/riot/index.js -o implementations/riot/bundle.js && browserify implementations/virtualdom/index.js -o implementations/virtualdom/bundle.js && browserify -t brfs -d implementations/knockout/index.js -o implementations/knockout/bundle.js && browserify -t brfs implementations/ractive-redux/index.js -o implementations/ractive-redux/bundle.js
scripts.watch:ractive-redux: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -t brfs -d implementations/ractive-redux/index.js -o implementations/ractive-redux/bundle.js

author: TehShrike
